apiElements.name: PubDataGenerator
apiElements.documentation:
Generates `pub-data.json` in the output directory, containing the extracted
[PubDartdocData] instance.

apiElements.name: generate
apiElements.documentation:
Generate the documentation for the given package in the specified
directory. Completes the returned future when done.

apiElements.name: onFileCreated
apiElements.documentation: Fires when a file is created.

apiElements.name: writtenFiles
apiElements.documentation: Fetches all filenames written by this generator.
